Songdao International Convention and Exhibition Center is about 15 minutes away from Incheon International Airport. It has 1.2.3 pavilions. There is a quiet reading area in the three pavilions. It charges itself in leisure time. The environment is very good. It is a modern building with perfect facilities.

There is a river just beside Songdao Park. It's very beautiful. There are many international exhibitions here. It's a big Convention and Exhibition center. It's very close to the airport and convenient for transportation.

Matsushima International Convention and Exhibition Center is equipped with the most sophisticated network facilities. It has one floor underground and four floors above ground. It is an international conference and exhibition center with an area of 54,000 feet. There are 450 booths in the exhibition hall, which can hold various exhibitions, public performances and special events. The conference rooms of various sizes are equipped with advanced multimedia facilities such as wireless networks, voice-controlled cameras, LCD devices, and can accommodate up to 2,000 people. In addition, banquets, family gatherings, weddings and other forms of activities, regardless of size, can provide satisfactory services, perfect facilities to bring convenience to guests. Matsushima International Convention and Exhibition Center is about 15 minutes from Incheon International Airport and 60 minutes from Seoul to the center. It is suitable for both business activities and short trips to Seoul/Gyeonggi. There are also six Super hotels around the center, as well as department stores, shopping malls and other leisure facilities. The unique appearance of the center is reminiscent of the Sydney Opera House in Australia. The high-grade interior decoration design is beautiful and often used as the background for shooting in various public performances and fashion shows.
The restaurants inside are delicious and clean
